modName: Skyrim Might and Magic Soundtrack Project - Add-on to Personalized Music - Add your own music to Skyrim
summary: Have you ever missed old school music? Are you heroes or Might and Magic fan? Do you liked the M&M series and its Music? If yes you've came to right place!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Hello there!

[/size][/font]Have you ever missed old school music? Are you heroes or Might and Magic fan? Do you liked the M&M series and its Music? If yes you've came to right place!
This soundtrack project add music from most known games from 3DO And Ubisoft games. (Aka, Heroes 2,3,4 5 and 6, Might and Magic Mandate of heaven (6), For blood and honour (7) and Day of destroyer (8))

This mod is an Add-On to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13286/?]Personalized Music - Add your own music to Skyrim[/url] by [b]No_Aardvarks_Allowed and of course its needed to work.

DISCLAIMER:
Since this series is old and most of interiors were dungeons (or maps in heroes), this music is less unlikely to fit into Taverns/Homes. Just matter of taste though.

And remember its not standalone it requires Personalized Music to work!

[/b][/center][center][b]

[/b]:How to install:
0.Download it (duh!)
1.unzip the archive.
2.Download and Install via NMM or anything else or just manually, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13286/?]Personalized Music - Add your own music to Skyrim[/url] you can pick no vanilla music or with vanilla music.
3.Put the data folder to .../Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim
4.Overwrite if asked
5.Enjoy

:Installation with already installed Personalized Music and own music:
1.Unzip this file
2.Paste it into .../Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim and overwrite (don't worry it won't overwrite your actual music files)
3.Check if you're not above track limit
4.Rename each file manually according to instructions writen in each subfolder (just open track.txt for example in: Combat - All) or use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71594/?]File Renamer for the Personalized Music Mod[/url]  by  [b]BlackoutRoulette.[/b] Simply click one jar file and magic will do the rest (life is easy, let's make it easier!)
5.MAKE SURE YOU'RE NOT ABOVE LIMIT, PLEASE.
6.Enjoy!

If you already have  Personalized Music with own music you will need to rename all files from this Mod (I added version with just numbers so it won't overwrite your already made music files.)



Music used from:
Heroes of might and magic 5 and 6 (Ubisoft)
Heroes of might and magic 2,3 and 4 (3DO)
Might and Magic Mandate of Heaven (6), For Blood And Honour (7) and Day of Destroyer (8)

Updates:

Soon i guess.

FAQ:
Q:Why make addon to another mod? 
A:Some people use PM and its super easy to modify in anytime, if i would made it an standalone. People would never modify it/remove tracks they don't like.

Q:Will you make standalone?
A:If i will know how to, sure!

Q:More music from might and magic series?
A: Yes! Hopefully i will find more fitting tracks.

Q:Some tracks don't fit (here example)
A: Yes i know that, if you played any might and magic games you got used to that, also M&M didn't have any Tavern/Home music so its hard to find fitting one.

Q:Why this game though?
A:Nostalgia, that's why.


Credits: 
-No_Aardvarks_Allowed and his "Personalized Music - Add your own music to Skyrim" mod just amazing work!
File Renamer for the Personalized Music Mod by [b]BlackoutRoulette[/b] which saved 20 mins of typing.
-Paul Romero for amazing soundtracks
-Not existing anymore 3DO for great games.
-Ubisoft for great soundtrack in Heroes 5 and 6!

Samples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j11YoGNZVL8&t=104s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=psx54mEgNsc[/center]
